articles.description: Kylian Mbappe is always the headline act when he pulls on the France shirt, but an old campaigner shared top billing by rolling back the years against Austria.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Off night for France captain, but N'Golo Kante shines in Euro 2024 opener

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says his late collapse at the US Open was one of the "toughest" days in his near 17-year professional career.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: Northern Irishman says US Open defeat one of his 'toughest' days

articles.description: Slovakia pulled off one of the biggest upsets in European Championship history with their victory over Belgium, who suffered from "lousy finishing".
articles.title: 'Scandalous decision' & 'lousy finishing’ - Belgium suffer huge Euros shock against Slovakia

articles.description: Captain Kylian Mbappe sustains a potentially broken nose during France's 1-0 win over Austria in their opening Euro 2024 game.
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: France captain 'not doing well' after nose injury

articles.description: Aryna Sabalenka says she will not compete at this summer's Olympic Games in Paris in order to prioritise her health.
articles.title: Aryna Sabalenka: World number three will not play at Paris Olympics

articles.description: While only the coldest of hearts could not have sympathy for Rory McIlroy, his US Open meltdown proves he needs to rethink his approach to majors, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Rory McIlroy's US Open meltdown at Pinehurst proves something has to radically change

articles.description: Follow live text, listen to radio commentary, plus score updates and match stats from Austria vs France in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Austria vs France LIVE: Euro 2024 football score, commentary, line-ups and updates
Euro 2024: Belgium face Slovakia in Group E opener

articles.description: Wimbledon champion Marketa Vondrousova begins her grass-court campaign with victory over Rebeka Masarova at the Berlin Open.
articles.title: Berlin Open: Wimbledon champion Marketa Vondrousova begins grass court season with win
